summary: Cora spends her days begrudgingly answering phones at a Prayer Call Center under the watch of well-intentioned leader Bill. When a caller shows up convinced he's been saved by her voice, she must decide if she's the one he thinks she is.
cast: Brittany Snow|William H. Macy|Tom Lipinski|Glenne Headly|Kate Flannery|Rhonda Freya English|Marty Bufalini|Alicia Clark|Cole Corey|Jesse Einstein|Nicole Forester|Aral Gribble|Ruby Harris|Audrey Kang|Joseph Kathrein|Maisie Klompus|Stephanie Koenig|Sareeya McNally|Mark Rademacher|Donna Barbera
title: Dial a Prayer
